response.overview: Aurora (Vanessa) embarks on a dangerous mission to face the ruthless villain, Wulfgar. Determined to prove herself, she defies the warnings of her devoted girlfriend, Verdra (Ophelia), a powerful warrior heroine who fears Aurora is not yet ready to face such a formidable foe. Despite Verdra’s concerns, Aurora reassures her that she is prepared—yet neither of them knows the true extent of Wulfgar's power. Wulfgar harbors the terrifying ability to transform into an even stronger entity, a force far beyond even Verdra's strength.  As Aurora confronts Wulfgar, her powers prove useless against him, and she quickly finds herself outmatched. Desperate, Verdra rushes to her side, only to realize too late that defeating Wulfgar in his current form will only unlock his full, unstoppable potential. Transformed into the indomitable Titus, Wulfgar becomes a nearly invincible force, far stronger than either heroine could have anticipated.
response.title: Fury of the Heart
